entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bagotville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Bagotville 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
